content:
Yes, I can certainly help with that. Moray is known for several annual festivals that take place throughout the year. Some upcoming events in Moray include:

- The Spirit of Speyside Whisky Festival (November 3-8, 2021)
- The Forres Theme Day (November 6, 2021)
- The Keith Festival of Traditional Music and Song (TBD 2022)
- The Findhorn Bay Festival (September 2022)

Please note that due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, events may be subject to change or cancellation. It's always a good idea to check the official event websites or social media pages for the latest information.
